column4: hi, i just upgraded from 10.04 to 10.10 and my sound is really quiet...  i looked online and found suggestions i recompile the kernel.  is there a simpler way to fix it?
oerheks i'd be willing to do that, but kpackagekit doesn't seem to think there is an upgrade available...  maybe i need to click some option to have it show up?
all sound? there is volume settings for system sounds aside from the main volume control
yes, all sound.  i've found the control panel and turned everything all the way up, with barely any effect
